name: Black Hole Rodeo
description:
Black Hole Rodeo

->Play Fullscreen 

Lore: U got lost nearby a black hole. Survive till u get picked up by ur girl (2min).

Tip: Handle ur engine carefully.

Sound: There is none. Space is quiet. But feel free to listen to ur fav songs while ur grinding for the Highscore.

Post: Ur Highscore in the comments. Is someone able to stay alive for 2mins?

Credits:  some Graphics are made by Enmanuelle Ferreira                                                        

Note: My first game ever. Written in plain C with the Raylib framework; Made for Jame Gam #16
